thread.title: Watch Trae Tha Truth Push A Bullet Out Of His Arm
thread.title_full: Watch Trae Tha Truth Push A Bullet Out Of His Arm

author: Danny Schwartz
title: Watch Trae Tha Truth Push A Bullet Out Of His Arm
text:
Home > News > Watch Trae Tha Truth Push A Bullet Out Of His Arm Watch Trae Tha Truth Push A Bullet Out Of His Arm 1 0 Posted by Danny Schwartz , Jan 20, 2017 at 09:59am Savage move. 
Trae the Truth was shot outside a Houston strip club back in 2012 and has had a bullet lodged in his arm ever since. That is, he had a bullet lodged in his arm until yesterday, when he was able to push it out of his arm. He recorded a video of him dislodging the bullet and posted it to Instagram. 
“The Bullet That’s Been Sittin In My Shoulder The Past Few Years Decided To Come Out…. Gotta Thank God I’m Still Here," he wrote in the caption. 
The video is not for the faint of heart: Trae coaxes out the massive bullet and it drops to the table with an ominous thud. Stoic. Watch it below. A video posted by traeabn (@traeabn) on Jan 18, 2017 at 10:16am PST
